rulings.text: Because Take Inventory is still on the stack as it’s resolving, that spell card isn’t in your graveyard and won’t affect the number of cards you draw.

mainBoard.text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Take Inventory in your graveyard.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"What's your plan?" Gideon asked.
"Are you serious?" Chandra replied.

foreignData.flavorText: „Wie lautet dein Plan?", fragte Gideon. „Fragst du mich das im Ernst?", antwortete Chandra.
foreignData.name: Flammenstrom
foreignData.text: Der Flammenstrom fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu. Falls eine Kreatur, der auf diese Weise Schaden zugefügt wurde, in diesem Zug sterben würde, schicke sie stattdessen ins Exil.

foreignData.flavorText: "¿Cuál es tu plan?", preguntó Gideon. "¿Hablas en serio?", le respondió Chandra.
foreignData.name: Ráfaga incendiaria
foreignData.text: La Ráfaga incendiaria hace 3 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo. Si una criatura que recibió daño de esta manera fuera a morir este turno, en vez de eso, exíliala.

foreignData.flavorText: « Quel est ton plan ? » demanda Gideon. « Tu es sérieux ? » répondit Chandra.
foreignData.name: Flot incendiaire
foreignData.text: Le Flot incendiaire inflige 3 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur. Si une créature ayant subi des blessures de cette manière devait mourir ce tour-ci, exilez-la à la place.

foreignData.flavorText: "Qual è il tuo piano?", chiese Gideon. "Dici sul serio?", rispose Chandra.
foreignData.name: Flusso Incendiario
foreignData.text: Il Flusso Incendiario infligge 3 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio. Se una creatura a cui è stato inflitto danno in questo modo sta per morire in questo turno, invece esiliala.

foreignData.flavorText: 「計画は？」とギデオンが訊いた。 「何言ってるの？」とチャンドラが答えた。
foreignData.name: 焼夷流
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。焼夷流はそれに３点のダメージを与える。このターン、これによりダメージを与えられたクリーチャーが死亡するなら、代わりにそれを追放する。

foreignData.flavorText: "계획이 뭐지?" 기디온이 물었다. "정말 몰라서 묻는 거야?" 찬드라가 대답했다.
foreignData.name: 방화의 흐름
foreignData.text: 생물이나 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 방화의 흐름은 그 목표에 피해 3점을 입힌다. 이렇게 피해를 입은 생물이 이번 턴에 죽으려고 하면, 대신에 그 생물을 추방한다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Qual é o seu plano?", perguntou Gideon. "Sério?", retrucou Chandra.
foreignData.name: Fluxo Incendiário
foreignData.text: Fluxo Incendiário causa 3 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo. Se uma criatura que sofreu dano dessa maneira morreria neste turno, em vez disso, exile-a.

foreignData.flavorText: «Какой у тебя план?» — спросил Гидеон. «Ты серьезно?» — ответила Чандра.

foreignData.flavorText: 「你有什么计划？」基定问。 「你开玩笑吧？」茜卓答道。

mainBoard.name: Incendiary Flow
mainBoard.originalText: Incendiary Flow deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: The damaged creature will be exiled if it would die for any reason that turn, not just if it dies due to damage from Incendiary Flow.

mainBoard.text: Incendiary Flow deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

foreignData.text: 将至多一张目标瞬间牌和至多一张目标法术牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上，然后弃一张牌。放逐碾碎心智。

foreignData.flavorText: 一些痛苦思緒便足以嚙咬心智，直到一無所剩。
foreignData.name: 碾碎心智
foreignData.text: 將至多一張目標瞬間牌和至多一張目標巫術牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上，然後棄一張牌。放逐碾碎心智。

mainBoard.name: Shreds of Sanity
mainBoard.originalText: Return up to one target instant card and up to one target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card. Exile Shreds of Sanity.

rulings.text: You may discard one of the cards you return to your hand. If you have no other cards in hand, you must discard one of the cards you return to your hand.
You may cast Shreds of Sanity with just one target. You may also cast it without any targets if you just want to discard a card.

If you target two cards and one of the targeted cards becomes illegal, you’ll still return the other one, discard a card, and exile Shreds of Sanity. If each targeted card becomes illegal, Shreds of Sanity doesn’t resolve and you won’t discard a card or exile Shreds of Sanity.

mainBoard.text: Return up to one target instant card and up to one target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card. Exile Shreds of Sanity.

mainBoard.flavorText: Previously the training center for cathars, the Elgaud Grounds are now used by the Lunarch Inquisition to punish those considered to be heretics.

foreignData.flavorText: Einst wurden in den Ellgau-Gründen Katharer ausgebildet, doch nun bestrafen dort die Inquisitoren der Lunarchen all jene, die sie als Ketzer ansehen.
foreignData.name: Einäschern
foreignData.text: Einäschern fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 5 Schadenspunkte zu. Falls diese Kreatur in diesem Zug sterben würde, schicke sie stattdessen ins Exil.

foreignData.flavorText: El Distrito Elgaud, que antes fuera el centro de entrenamiento de los cátaros, es ahora utilizado por la Inquisición lunarca para castigar a los que consideran herejes.
foreignData.name: Reducir a cenizas
foreignData.text: Reducir a cenizas hace 5 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo. Si esa criatura fuese a morir este turno, en vez de eso, exíliala.

foreignData.flavorText: Ancien centre d'entraînement des cathares, les Terrains d'Elgaud sont aujourd'hui utilisés par l'Inquisition lunarque pour punir ceux qu'ils considèrent hérétiques.
foreignData.name: Réduire en cendres
foreignData.text: Réduire en cendres inflige 5 blessures à une créature ciblée. Si cette créature devait mourir ce tour-ci, exilez-la à la place.

foreignData.flavorText: I Campi di Elgaud, in passato il centro di addestramento dei catari, ora vengono usati dall'Inquisizione del Lunarca per punire chiunque sia considerato eretico.
foreignData.name: Ridurre in Cenere
foreignData.text: Ridurre in Cenere infligge 5 danni a una creatura bersaglio. Se quella creatura sta per morire in questo turno, invece esiliala.

foreignData.flavorText: かつて聖戦士の訓練が行われていたエルゴード訓練場は、今は月皇の審問により異端とみなされた人々の処刑場となっている。
foreignData.name: 灰と化す
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。灰と化すはそれに５点のダメージを与える。そのクリーチャーがこのターンに死亡するなら、代わりにそれを追放する。

foreignData.flavorText: 한 때 성전사 양성소였던 엘고드 주둔지는 이제 달의 심문관이 이단자를 처벌하는 장소로 사용한다.
foreignData.name: 완전 전소
foreignData.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 완전 전소는 그 생물에게 피해 5점을 입힌다. 그 생물이 이 턴에 죽게 된다면, 대신 추방한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Antes o centro de treinamento dos cátaros, o Campo de Elgaud é agora usado pela Inquisição dos Lunarcas para punir os considerados hereges.
foreignData.name: Reduzir a Cinzas
foreignData.text: Reduzir a Cinzas causa 5 pontos de dano à criatura alvo. Se aquela criatura for morrer neste turno, em vez disso, exile-a.

foreignData.flavorText: Элгодское поле было тренировочным лагерем для катаров, а теперь инквизиция лунархов карает там тех, кого считает еретиками.
foreignData.name: Превращение в Прах
foreignData.text: Превращение в Прах наносит 5 повреждений целевому существу. Если то существо должно умереть в этом ходу, изгоните его вместо этого.

foreignData.flavorText: 艾尔告操练场曾被用作护教军的训练中心，如今被月主教审判官在此惩罚他们认定的异教徒。
foreignData.name: 烧成灰烬
foreignData.text: 烧成灰烬对目标生物造成5点伤害。如果本回合中该生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。

foreignData.flavorText: 艾爾告操練場曾被用作護教軍的訓練中心，如今被月主教審判官在此懲罰他們認定的異教徒。
foreignData.name: 燒成灰燼
foreignData.text: 燒成灰燼對目標生物造成5點傷害。如果本回合中該生物將死去，則改為將它放逐。

mainBoard.name: Reduce to Ashes
mainBoard.originalText: Reduce to Ashes deals 5 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: The replacement effect of Reduce to Ashes will exile the target creature if it would die this turn for any reason, not just due to lethal damage.

mainBoard.text: Reduce to Ashes deals 5 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

mainBoard.flavorText: "'I'm certain that the fate of Markov Manor is connected to these cryptoliths . . .' This Tamiyo was on to something."

foreignData.flavorText: „‚Ich bin mir sicher, dass das Schicksal des Markov-Anwesens mit diesen Kryptolithen in Verbindung steht …' Diese Tamiyo war an etwas dran."
foreignData.name: Bücher wälzen
foreignData.text: Ziehe drei Karten, enttappe bis zu zwei Länder und wirf dann eine Karte ab.

foreignData.flavorText: "'Estoy convencida de que lo que ocurrió en la mansión Markov tiene relación con estos criptolitos...' Esta Tamiyo no iba desencaminada."
foreignData.name: Escrutar las páginas
foreignData.text: Roba tres cartas, endereza hasta dos tierras y luego descarta una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: « 'Je suis sûre que le sort du Manoir Markov est lié aux cryptolithes...' Cette Tamiyo tenait une piste. »
foreignData.name: Étude des pages
foreignData.text: Piochez trois cartes, dégagez jusqu'à deux terrains, puis défaussez-vous d'une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: "'Sono sicura che la sorte del Maniero Markov sia legata ai criptoliti...' Questa Tamiyo aveva scoperto qualcosa."
foreignData.name: Studiare le Pagine
foreignData.text: Pesca tre carte, STAPpa fino a due terre, poi scarta una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 「『マルコフ荘園の運命がこれらの謎の石と関係しているのは間違いない……』どうやらタミヨウは何かを知っていたようだ。」
foreignData.name: 熟読
foreignData.text: カードを３枚引き、土地最大２つをアンタップし、その後カード１枚を捨てる。

foreignData.flavorText: "'마르코프 저택의 운명이 이 신비석과 연관된 게 틀림 없어 . . .' 타미요는 그 사실을 알고 있었어."
foreignData.name: 탐독
foreignData.text: 카드 세 장을 뽑고, 대지를 최대 두 개까지 언탭한 후, 카드 한 장을 버린다.

foreignData.flavorText: "'Tenho certeza de que o destino da Mansão Markov está conectado a esses criptólitos...' Essa Tamiyo tinha descoberto alguma coisa."
foreignData.name: Meditar sobre as Páginas
foreignData.text: Compre três cards, desvire até dois terrenos e, depois, descarte um card.

foreignData.flavorText: «Уверен, что участь поместья Марковых связана с этими криптолитами... Похоже, Тамиё что-то разузнала».
foreignData.name: Корпеть над Страницами
foreignData.text: Возьмите три карты, разверните не более двух земель, затем сбросьте карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 「『我确信马可夫庄园的命运与这些秘石息息相关. . .』这个多美代肯定知道些什么。」
foreignData.name: 研读书页
foreignData.text: 抓三张牌，重置至多两个地，然后弃一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 「『我確信馬可夫莊園的命運與這些秘石息息相關. . .』這個多美代一定知道些什麼。」
foreignData.name: 研讀書頁
foreignData.text: 抽三張牌，重置至多兩個地，然後棄一張牌。

mainBoard.name: Pore Over the Pages
mainBoard.originalText: Draw three cards, untap up to two lands, then discard a card.

rulings.text: You choose which lands to untap after you have drawn three cards. Lands controlled by any player may be untapped this way.

mainBoard.text: Draw three cards, untap up to two lands, then discard a card.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Dear brother, it's sweet that you have chosen to share your toys with Ludevic, but I too have found some new playmates." —Ghoulcaller Gisa

foreignData.flavorText: „Liebster Bruder, es ist nett, dass du dein Spielzeug mit Ludevic teilen willst, aber auch ich habe neue Spielkameraden gefunden." —Gisa die Ghulruferin
foreignData.name: Den Fluten entsteigen
foreignData.text: Bringe für jede Spontanzauber- und Hexerei-Karte in deinem Friedhof einen 2/2 schwarzen Zombie-Kreaturenspielstein getappt ins Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText: "Querido hermano, es un detalle que hayas compartido tus juguetes con Ludevic, pero yo también encontré nuevos compañeros de juego". —Gisa, la llamamuertos
foreignData.name: Alzarse de entre las mareas
foreignData.text: Pon en el campo de batalla girada una ficha de criatura Zombie negra 2/2 por cada carta de instantáneo y de conjuro en tu cementerio.

foreignData.flavorText: « Mon cher frère, je me réjouis que tu aies décidé de partager tes jouets avec Ludevic, car j'ai moi aussi trouvé de nouveaux compagnons de jeu. » —Gisa, meneuse de goule
foreignData.name: Émergence des vagues
foreignData.text: Mettez sur le champ de bataille, engagé, un jeton de créature 2/2 noire Zombie pour chaque carte d'éphémère et de rituel dans votre cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText: "Caro fratello, mi rallegra che tu abbia scelto di condividere i tuoi giocattoli con Ludevic, ma anch'io ho trovato qualche nuovo compagno di giochi." —Gisa l'evocaghoul
foreignData.name: Emergere dai Flutti
foreignData.text: Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Zombie 2/2 nera TAPpata per ogni carta istantaneo e stregoneria nel tuo cimitero.

foreignData.flavorText: 「愛する弟へ。 貴方の玩具をルーデヴィックと分け合うことにしたのはさぞ楽しかろうと思います。そうそう、私も新しい遊び相手を見つけたところなのですよ。」 ――グール呼びのギサ
foreignData.name: 潮からの蘇生
foreignData.text: あなたの墓地にあるインスタント・カードとソーサリー・カードの合計に等しい数の、黒の２/２のゾンビ・クリーチャー・トークンをタップ状態で戦場に出す。

foreignData.flavorText: "친애하는 동생아, 네 장난감들을 루데비치와 공유하기로 했다니 참으로 잘됐구나. 나 역시 쓸만한 새로운 놀잇감을 찾아냈단다." —악귀소환술사 기샤
foreignData.name: 조류에서의 귀환
foreignData.text: 당신의 무덤에 있는 순간마법 및 집중마법 카드 한 장당 2/2 흑색 좀비 생물 토큰 한 개를 탭된 채로 전장에 놓는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Caro irmão, é muito gentil da sua parte compartilhar seus brinquedos com Ludevic, mas eu também encontrei alguns colegas novos para brincar." — Invocadora de carniçais Gisa
foreignData.name: Erguer-se das Marés
foreignData.text: Coloque no campo de batalha virada uma ficha de criatura preta 2/2 do tipo Zumbi para cada card de mágica instantânea ou feitiço em seu cemitério.

foreignData.flavorText: «Дорогой братец! Я рада, что ты решил поделиться своими игрушками с Людевиком, но и я тоже нашла новых товарищей по играм». — призывательница упырей Джиза
foreignData.name: Восстать из Волн
foreignData.text: Положите на поле битвы повернутой одну фишку существа 2/2 черный Зомби за каждую карту мгновенного заклинания и волшебства на вашем кладбище.

foreignData.flavorText: 「亲爱的弟弟，你把自己的玩具和卢德维一起分享真是好心，不过我也找到了一些新玩伴。」 ～尸鬼牧者基沙
foreignData.name: 浪潮复生
foreignData.text: 你坟墓场中每有一张瞬间与法术牌，便将一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物横置放进战场。

foreignData.flavorText: 「親愛的弟弟，你把自己的玩具和盧德維一起分享真是好心，不過我也找到了一些新玩伴。」 ～屍鬼牧者基沙
foreignData.name: 浪潮復生
foreignData.text: 你墳墓場中每有一張瞬間與巫術牌，便將一個2/2黑色殭屍衍生生物橫置放進戰場。

mainBoard.name: Rise from the Tides
mainBoard.originalText: Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield tapped for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.

rulings.text: Rise from the Tides is still on the stack while you count the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. It doesn’t count itself.

mainBoard.text: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"There are tides beyond those in the sea that are driven by Innistrad's silver moon. If you learn their patterns, you can channel them in fascinating ways."
—Tamiyo

foreignData.flavorText: „Es gibt Gezeiten außerhalb der Meere, die von Innistrads silbernem Mond beeinflusst werden. Wenn du ihre Muster erlernst, kannst du ihre Macht auf faszinierende Weise kanalisieren." —Tamiyo
foreignData.name: Zur Seite abwenden
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl, der eine bleibende Karte, die du kontrollierst, als Ziel hat.

foreignData.flavorText: "Aparte de las mareas, hay otras fuerzas generadas por el influjo de la luna plateada de Innistrad en el mar. Si aprendes sus mecánicas, podrás canalizarlas de maneras fascinantes". —Tamiyo
foreignData.name: Hacer a un lado
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo que hace objetivo a un permanente que controlas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Il y a des marées autres que celles de la mer qui sont dictées par la lune argentée d'Innistrad. En apprenant leur rythme, vous pourrez les canaliser de manières fascinantes. » —Tamiyo
foreignData.name: Déviation
foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé qui cible un permanent que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.flavorText: "Esistono altre maree, oltre a quelle dei mari, governate dalla luna argentea di Innistrad. Se ne scopri i flussi, potrai incanalarli in modi affascinanti." —Tamiyo
foreignData.name: Scansare
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio che bersaglia un permanente che controlli.

foreignData.flavorText: 「イニストラードの銀の月が引き起こす動きは、潮の干満だけではありません。パターンを学べば、あなたもそれと魅惑的な繋がりを持てるでしょう。」 ――タミヨウ
foreignData.name: 取り繕い
foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールするパーマネントを対象とする呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。

foreignData.flavorText: "이니스트라드에는 은빛 달이 만드는 파도보다 더 높은 파도가 존재해. 이 파도가 이는 패턴만 이해한다면 그 힘을 원하는 방식으로 이용할 수 있어." —타미요
foreignData.name: 벗어나기
foreignData.text: 당신이 조종하는 지속물을 목표로 정한 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다.

foreignData.flavorText: "A lua de prata de Innistrad controla outros ciclos além daquele do mar. Quem os desvenda é capaz de canalizar sua energia de maneiras fascinantes." — Tamiyo
foreignData.name: Desviar Olhar
foreignData.text: Anule a mágica alvo que tenha como alvo uma permanente que você controla.

foreignData.flavorText: «Помимо морских, существуют и другие приливы, зависящие от серебряной луны Иннистрада. Выучив закономерности, их можно направлять, добиваясь удивительных эффектов». — Тамиё
foreignData.name: Поворот в Сторону
foreignData.text: Отмените целевое заклинание, целью которого является перманент под вашим контролем.

foreignData.flavorText: 「海中有些潮汐是因依尼翠银月而起。只要知晓其规律，便能以奇妙的方式引导它们。」 ～多美代

mainBoard.name: Geistblast
mainBoard.originalText:
Geistblast deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
{2}{U}, Exile Geistblast from your graveyard: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.

rulings.text: Geistblast’s ability can copy any instant or sorcery spell, not just one with targets.

When Geistblast’s ability resolves, it creates a copy of the instant or sorcery spell. The copy is created on the stack, so it’s not “cast.” Abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell won’t trigger. The copy will then resolve like a normal spell, before the original spell resolves but after players get a chance to cast spells and activate abilities.

The copy will have the same targets as the spell it’s copying unless you choose new ones. You may change any number of the targets, including all of them or none of them. If, for one of the targets, you can’t choose a new legal target, then it remains unchanged (even if the current target is illegal).
If the spell being copied is modal (that is, it says “Choose one —” or the like), the copy will have the same mode. You can’t choose a different one.
If the spell being copied has an X whose value was determined as it was cast (like Avacyn’s Judgment’s madness cost has), the copy will have the same value of X.
If the spell has damage divided as it was cast (also like Avacyn’s Judgment), the division can’t be changed (although the targets receiving that damage still can).
If an alternative cost was paid for the spell, such as its madness cost or surge cost, the same alternative cost is considered to have been paid for the copy.

mainBoard.text:
